"Victoria": "Okay! Now I'll teach you about how to obtain more cards."
"You can obtain new card by exchanging Card Scratch Coupons."
"Said coupons can be obtained by battling someone in Line Strike."
"...Actually, this'd also be much quicker if you just tried it out yourself."
"Since it's your first time, I'll give you a Card Scratch Coupon as a present, just for you!"
"Alright, go on and try it out!"
